attributes.action: Stop lying to the British Public, hold an election and referendum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown is leading us into national oblivion with the EU Constitution (call it what it is, not a treaty).

Gordon Brown does nothing but lie to the British Public.

I petition Gordon Brown to stand down and let the British Public decide on it's own future.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
